topics.subtitle: 접속사란?
topics.explanation: 접속사는 단어, 구, 문장을 연결하는 역할을 하는 품사이다. 등위접속사와 종속접속사로 구분된다.

topics.subtitle: 등위접속사 (and/but/or/so)
topics.explanation: 대등한 관계의 단어나 문장을 연결. and(추가), but(대조), or(선택), so(결과).

examples.english: It is raining, but I will go.
I was tired, so I went to bed early.

topics.subtitle: 종속접속사 (because/when/if/that)
topics.explanation: 주절과 종속절을 연결. because(이유), when(시간), if(조건), that(내용).

examples.english: I am happy because I see you.

examples.korean: 네가 올 때 when, 나는 요리할게.
examples.english: I will cook when you come.

examples.korean: 만약 비가 오면 if, 우리는 집에 있을 거야.
examples.english: We will stay home if it rains.
I think that he is kind.

topics.subtitle: 상관접속사 (both A and B / not only A but also B)
topics.explanation: 짝을 이루어 사용하는 접속사. both A and B(A와 B 모두), not only A but also B(A뿐만 아니라 B도).

examples.english: He is both smart and kind.

examples.type: not only A but also B
examples.korean: 그녀는 not only 노래를 잘 부르지만 but also 춤도 잘 춘다.
examples.english: She not only sings well but also dances well.

topics.subtitle: 접속사 vs 접속부사
topics.explanation: 접속사(but)는 문장을 연결하지만, 접속부사(however)는 독립된 문장을 시작하며, 보통 마침표나 세미콜론과 함께 쓴다.

examples.english: I went, but he was not there.
I went. However, he was not there.

topics.subtitle: 주의할 점
topics.explanation: ① because와 so, although와 but 같은 의미 중복 사용 금지. ② 등위접속사로 연결할 때는 구조가 평행해야 함. ③ that의 생략 가능 여부 주의.

examples.korean: ✗ Because I was tired, so I slept. (Because와 so 중복)
examples.english: ✗ Because I was tired, so I slept.
Because I was tired, I slept. / I was tired, so I slept.

examples.korean: ✗ I like to swim and running. (to swim - running 불평행)
examples.english: ✗ I like to swim and running.

examples.korean: 나는 수영하는 것과 달리기하는 것을 좋아한다.
examples.english: I like swimming and running. / I like to swim and to run.
